item.title: A Guide to Quickly Debug a Ruby Gem with Pry and Git Bisect
item.description: Are you trying to debug an issue on a Ruby gem but not sure how? Here’s a quick way to debug Ruby code using Pry and Git Bisect. When doing triage of open issues on Faker, an open-source Ruby gem, I came across Issue #2482. I was able to reproduce the problem. Turns out the bug was already fixed by this PR, but version 2.20.0 was released before that. I thought this would be a great opportunity to show you how I debugged this issue so you can improve your debugging skills.

item.title: How to Contribute to Ruby on Rails
item.description: Are you looking for an opportunity to get more experience as a Ruby on Rails developer? Make meaningful connections with the community? Learn the best practices on how to maintain a large codebase? “I’ve always wanted to contribute to the biggest code base I know: Ruby on Rails. It’s also the one who pays for my food. But I had been struggling with how to get started until Hexdevs started sharing different ways to do it.
